title: Win It Weekly: Continental Gravel and Road Tire Pack
content:
How does Win It Weekly work?

Simply fill out the form below for your chance to win a Continental gravel and road tire pack.

Prize:

  • Grand Prix 5000 with coffee-colored sidewall – one pair
  • Terra Speed with cream-colored sidewall – one pair
  • MSRP US$295.80

Prize Details:

The winner will receive one set of Continental’s Terra Speed Gravel tires and one set of Continental’s Grand Prix 5000 tires.  Both are now available with coffee and cream sidewalls. This prize pack is made to get you over rough and smooth road surfaces.
author: CyclingTips
